    • getTrafficLightColor

      public static Color getTrafficLightColor(char signal)
      Returns the traffic light color. Traffic light signals can be one of the letters ryGgsuoO but currently, only ryGg are implemented, the other signals are default to black.
      Parameters:
      signal - the signal of traffic light
      Returns:
      the traffic light color
